info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:17AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact areas near and around I-40 between Winslow and Petrified Forest through 100 PM MDT/NOON MST/... At 1215 PM MDT/1115 AM MST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holbrook, or 36 miles east of Winslow, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous driving along impacted roadways. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holbrook, Joseph City, Sun Valley, Woodruff, Petrified Forest National Park, Petrified Forest N.P. Visitors Center and Petrified Forest N.P. Headquarters. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 275 and 289. Interstate 40 between mile markers 264 and 317. State Route 377 between mile markers 19 and 33. State Route 87 between mile markers 356 and 365. State Route 77 between mile markers 371 and 408. Highway 180 between mile markers 308 and 341. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
